title: Bug 18705: Too much flashing in Control Example
description: The Control Example exhibits excessive flashing.
OB: When running the Control Example and resizing the window vertically, all tabs in the TabFolder and all frames flash.
EB: Only the bottom edge of the outermost frames should be repainted, reducing the amount of flashing.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Launch the Control Example. 2. Resize the window vertically. 3. Observe that all tabs in the TabFolder and all frames flash.
